repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:20.04
ARG DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update \
    && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install \
        binutils \
        curl \
        iproute2 \
        iputils-ping \
        nano \
        net-tools \
        dnsutils \
        tcpdump \
        bind9 \
        bind9utils \
     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

CMD service named start && tail -f /dev/null
